chapters.title: Prologue: Fortress of the Light
chapters.info: Matrim (Mat) Cauthon, p. 26 (12)—Young man from Emond's Field. He is ta'veren, and has considerable luck with random events, such as dice games. He went to Tar Valon to be separated from the dagger he carries, a dagger tainted with the evil of Shadar Logoth. See also al'Thor, Rand; Aybara, Perrin; Cauthon, Abell.
